Driver-FastshipHu
APPL
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NAME)
Editor
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NUMBER)
This app requires access to Apple Music to play audio content and manage your music library for a better user experience.
This app needs access to your calendar to schedule and manage delivery events, ensuring timely service coordination.
This app requires full calendar access to create, modify, and manage delivery schedules and appointments effectively.
This app needs camera access to scan documents, capture delivery proof photos, and verify package conditions.
This app requires access to your contacts to help you quickly find and communicate with customers and delivery recipients.
This app uses Face ID to securely authenticate your identity and protect your account information.
This app requires continuous location access to track your position for real-time delivery updates, route optimization, and to notify you of nearby delivery opportunities.
This app needs background location access to provide real-time delivery tracking and receive location-based notifications even when the app is not active.
This app requires location access while in use to show your current position on the map, calculate delivery routes, and find nearby delivery opportunities.
This app needs microphone access to enable voice commands, record delivery notes, and facilitate hands-free communication during deliveries.
This app requires access to save photos to your library for delivery documentation, proof of delivery, and package condition records.
This app needs access to your photo library to upload delivery documentation, proof of delivery photos, and package condition images.
This app requires speech recognition access to enable voice commands for hands-free operation during deliveries and navigation.
This app needs access to the device's motion sensors to detect emergency situations, enable shake-to-report features, and enhance delivery safety monitoring.
The app needs permission to send notifications so you don't miss new orders and important updates.
LaunchScreen
Main
